## âœ… Checklist

<!-- Check all boxes that apply -->

### General

- [ ] I have read the [CONTRIBUTING.md](CONTRIBUTING.md) guidelines
- [ ] My changes follow the repository's style and format
- [ ] I have checked for duplicate tools/content

### For Tool Additions

- [ ] I have tested the tool myself
- [ ] The tool is currently active and working
- [ ] The tool has a meaningful free tier (not just a 3-day trial)
- [ ] All links work correctly (tested within last 24 hours)
- [ ] I have added the tool to the correct category
- [ ] I have updated the Table of Contents (if adding new category)
- [ ] I have included the tool's description
- [ ] I have marked if it's AI-powered or not

### For Documentation Updates

- [ ] I have checked for spelling and grammar errors
- [ ] All code examples work correctly
- [ ] All links are valid and working

### For Bug Fixes

- [ ] I have identified the issue clearly
- [ ] I have tested the fix
- [ ] I have updated related documentation (if needed)
